metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3752 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: internal/app/ChooserActivity.java in the ChooserTarget service in Android6.x before 2016-07-01 mishandles target security checks, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug28384423.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
